quizData.question: Which of the following best describes latency?

It is used when data is transmitted as individual characters

quizData.question: Which of the following implies collision avoidance?
quizData.answer: The switch tries to prevent collision by having the intention of each computer to transmit signal before transmission

quizData.question: Which of the following statements best describes Time-division multiplexing?
